name: Sencia
description:
Sencia Canada Ltd. is an innovative software application development company with focus on SaaS (Software as a Service) solutions. We are dedicated to helping clients worldwide achieve their specific business goals through the use of strategy, design and technology. Sencia's flagship product is the Informetica Learning Content Management System, "Informetica" that is configured to meet specific busines needs.
Sencia partners with numerous e-Learning companies delivering and developing online courses. Other SaaS solutions include SIMS Content Management System and "Sencia Track" a configurable contact mangement system. Sencia also provides businesses and organizations with various Web hosting packages at various co-locations. Thunder Bay Web Hosting and Thunder Bay Web Design
